doc.after: Kern County suffers from severe air pollution Particulates cause poor visibility especially in the winter Western Kern County lies in the San Joaquin Valley and the topography traps pollutants Although the topography is not as unfavorable in eastern Kern County eastern Kern County is a non attainment area for particulates 48
